p.d: Rita realises that she has to do more to attract customers. She tries to involve Terri in developing the potential of her B&B but the latter's too upset by her lover's departure. Yolande becomes a model for a day. Lomer heads into town following a particularly seductive suggestion by Edmour... Directed by: Jean-Marc Piché (season 2, Canada, 2019) Screenplay: Patricia Léger Cast: Patricia Léger (Rita Melanson), Marie-Jo Thério (Yolande LeBlanc), Marcel-Romain Thériault (Lomer Dupuis), Marc Lamontagne (Edmour LeBlanc), Raphaël Butler (Ferraille Gaudet), Claire Normand (Gilberte Cormier), Gabriel Robichaud (Zoël Bourgeois), Bianca Richard (Terri Cormier) Genre: comedy
